name: ActionLinkGroupDefinition

fields.name: actionLinks
fields.description: A collection of action link definitions that make up the action link group.

fields.name: category
fields.description: Indicates the priority and location of the action links. Values are:

fields.name: executions​Allowed
fields.description: Defines the number of times an action link can be executed. Values are:

fields.name: id
fields.description: 18-character ID of the action link group definition.

fields.name: templateId
fields.description: The ID of the action link group template from which to

fields.name: url
fields.description: The URL for this action link group definition.

description: The definition of an action link group. Information in the action link group definition can be sensitive to a third party (for example, OAuth bearer token headers). For this reason, only calls made from the Apex namespace that created the action link group definition can read, modify, or delete the definition. In addition, the user making the call must have created the definition or have View All Data permission.
